headline: Mr. Trump, the Truth Is Coming Out
abstract: Who’s telling the truth about Ukraine? There’s one way to find out.
lead_paragraph: It’s just possible that common sense and reality have a shot at prying open the doors to the Senate chamber after all. After Republican senators claimed that it was perfectly reasonable to put a United States president on trial without hearing from any witnesses, a few of them are showing signs of recognizing that the truth matters. Or, at least, that the American people believe it does.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
The Room Where It Happened: A White House Memoir (Book)
